scripts.postbuild: move-file dist/tailwindcss-standalone-macos-x64 dist/tailwindcss-macos-x64 && move-file dist/tailwindcss-standalone-macos-arm64 dist/tailwindcss-macos-arm64 && move-file dist/tailwindcss-standalone-win-x64.exe dist/tailwindcss-windows-x64.exe && move-file dist/tailwindcss-standalone-win-arm64.exe dist/tailwindcss-windows-arm64.exe && move-file dist/tailwindcss-standalone-linuxstatic-x64 dist/tailwindcss-linux-x64 && move-file dist/tailwindcss-standalone-linuxstatic-arm64 dist/tailwindcss-linux-arm64 && move-file dist/tailwindcss-standalone-linuxstatic-armv7 dist/tailwindcss-linux-armv7 && npm run generate-checksums
